Recommendations: 1. The administration may allocate funds for training and scholarships abroad.
2. Encourage all BS Bio faculty to produce instructional materials in their own field of specialization.
3. It is suggested that all the instructional materials produced be copyrighted and patented.
4. All packaged documents need to conform with AACCUP standard to make it accreditor-friendly.
5. Encourage BS Bio faculty to become members of honor societies and scientific organizations.
6. Motivate faculty to present papers not only locally but also internationally.
